include figures in chunks and discuss your findings in the figure.

plot example

    x="name", 
    y="AK"
)
chart.show()

    .groupby('year')\
    .sum()\
    .reset_index()\
    .tail(10)\
    .filter(["year", "AK","AR"])

display(mydat)

    .tail(10)\
    .filter(["year", "AK","AR"])

display(mydat)
